alert.note: Alert for George; Greene; Perry; Stone; Wayne (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued March 30 at 12:01PM CDT until March 31 at 12:00AM CDT by NWS Mobile
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1 PM CDT THIS AFTERNOON... ...HIGH WIND WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 PM CDT THIS EVENING... ...WIND ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT FROM 9 PM THIS EVENING TO MIDNIGHT CDT TONIGHT... * WHAT...For the High Wind Warning, south winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts around 60 mph expected. For the Wind Advisory, southwest winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 55 mph expected. * WHERE...Perry, Greene, George, Stone and Wayne Counties. * WHEN...For the High Wind Warning, until 9 PM CDT this evening. For the first Wind Advisory, from 9 PM this evening to midnight CDT tonight. For the second Wind Advisory, until 1 PM CDT this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds will blow down trees and power lines. Widespread power outages are expected. Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: People should avoid being outside in forested areas and around trees and branches. If possible, remain in the lower levels of your home during the windstorm, and avoid windows. Use caution if you must drive.
